current_task: Expand filesystem to use new 750GB disk
message: Good news! User expanded the VM disk to 750GB in Proxmox. Now you need to resize the partition/filesystem inside the VM to use the new space. After that, you can retry the Solr recording index extraction.

if_not_lvm: # If not using LVM, use growpart:

steps_to_expand_filesystem.expected: Root filesystem should now show ~750GB total

steps_to_expand_filesystem.task: Clean up any partial extraction artifacts

steps_to_expand_filesystem.description: Now you have plenty of space for the 150GB uncompressed index

after_filesystem_expansion: Continue with hourly replication setup (systemd timers)
Continue with weekly Solr refresh setup
notes: The disk shows as 750G in Proxmox Hardware tab. VM may need the partition table rescanned - if lsblk still shows old size, try: sudo partprobe /dev/sda
